summary: Something that has iritated me is that Spellbreaker is clasified as a heavy shield even if you look at it it looks like light armor. And so i just made it a light armor and changed the weight and protection to match its now light armor version
descriptionHtml: Something that has iritated me is that Spellbreaker is clasified as a heavy shield even if you look at it it looks like light armor. And so i just made it a light armor and changed the weight and protection to match its now light armor version
author: Elricshan
